welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Oakville, known for its charming small-town atmosphere and stunning lake views. We invite you to explore our quaint shops, delicious restaurants, and scenic parks and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

restaurants.name: Roma Ristorante
restaurants.description: Roma Ristorante is a italian restaurant located in Oakville.

restaurants.name: Ro's Pizza
restaurants.description: Ro's Pizza is a pizzeria located in Oakville.

restaurants.name: Martino's Pizzaria
restaurants.description: Martino's Pizzaria is a pizzeria located in Oakville.

restaurants.name: Ordinary Joe's
restaurants.description: Ordinary Joe's is a american restaurant located in Watertown.

restaurants.name: Cavallo's Italian Specialty Shoppe
restaurants.description: Cavallo's Italian Specialty Shoppe is a deli located in Watertown.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and corporate aircraft, providing a luxurious and efficient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport houses the majority of the airport's services, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and various shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport primarily serves as a hub for Southwest Airlines, with a few other airlines operating from this terminal as well.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport is mainly used for international flights and is home to the airport's customs and immigration facilities.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'STL Free Wi-Fi' from their device's list of available networks.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Belleville Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Belleville Airport handles all cargo and freight operations, including shipping and receiving.
